answers.answer: Omg im sorry! I didnt even know i could have sex until after i went to my 6 week appointment...good luck i will keep you in my prayers

I personally know someone who has had 3 Caesareans and was pregnant within 9 weeks of having each she has done fine with every pregnancy except for her last, he was taken 7 weeks early because she had gestational diabetes. But it was nothing to do with being so close together. I wouldn't worry just take extra good care of yourself
Are you breast feeding? I was told if your breast feeding sometimes it works as birth control
I am not breastfeeding. I am just worried, I love babies but they said it needs to be at least 2 years before I have another.

You're most fertile after giving birth. You could be pregnant. If you're not then maybe ask you doctor about birth control since you know you're not supposed to have another baby for at least 2 years. I wouldn't risk getting pregnant that early especially since they've told you the situation...

I am coming for birth control! Lol. If we are pregnant it's because a condom broke. Either way I will be happy. But if I am I will be stressed. Lol. Keep me and my husband in your prayers. If I am, he dies. Just joking.
Yikes! I know it is possible, but I wish for the best for you! Good luck!

Seriously,  condoms. They constantly tell you that you are more fertile after having a baby and to use protection. Ladies you Really need to let your bodies heal from birth and to replenish the nutrient reserves the the previous pregnancy depleted.

question: Going to my 6 week appointment. I will find out if I am pregnant again. Has this happened to anyone else? I feel like I am again and this would be my fourth pregnancy, so I know the feeling. I'm in need of prayers. My husband and I love babies, but need to heal first before having another since I had a c-section. Any mommy's out there possibly pregnant going to their 6 weeks after baby appointment?!?!
title: Pregant at post 6 week appointment!?!?!
